languages.text: {n}Зрачки Соломона расширяются, он неотрывно следит, как ваши пальцы разрывают прошение на клочки. Когда он открывает рот, голос его надсадно хрипит:{/n} "Вы имели право поступить так... с моим покаянием".
{n}Solomorne's pupils dilate as he watches your fingers tear his letter to shreds. When he opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse:{/n} "You are entitled to do this... to my act of penance."
languages.original_text: {n}Зрачки Соломона расширяются, он неотрывно следит, как ваши пальцы разрывают прошение на клочки. Когда он открывает рот, голос его надсадно хрипит:{/n} "Вы имели право поступить так... с моим покаянием".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne's pupils dilate as he watches your fingers tear his letter to shreds. When he opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse:{/n} "You are entitled to do this... to my act of penance."

languages.text: {n}Les pupilles de Solomorne se dilatent tandis qu'il regarde vos mains réduire sa lettre en lambeaux. Quand il reprend la parole, sa voix est rauque :{/n} « Vous avez effectivement le droit de faire cela... à mon acte de pénitence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's pupils dilate as he watches your fingers tear his letter to shreds. When he opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse:{/n} "You are entitled to do this... to my act of penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les pupilles de Solomorne se dilatent tandis qu'il regarde vos mains réduire sa lettre en lambeaux. Quand il reprend la parole, sa voix est rauque :{/n} « Vous avez effectivement le droit de faire cela... à mon acte de pénitence. »

languages.text: {n}あなたの指が彼の手紙を引き裂いていくのを見つめながら、ソロモーンの瞳が大きく開いた。彼が口を開いたとき、その声はかすれていた。{/n}「これはあなたの当然の権利です…私の償いに対して」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's pupils dilate as he watches your fingers tear his letter to shreds. When he opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse:{/n} "You are entitled to do this... to my act of penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの指が彼の手紙を引き裂いていくのを見つめながら、ソロモーンの瞳が大きく開いた。彼が口を開いたとき、その声はかすれていた。{/n}「これはあなたの当然の権利です…私の償いに対して」

languages.text: {n}Las pupilas de Solomorne se ensanchan al ver cómo despedazas su carta. Con voz ronca, comenta:{/n} «Tiene derecho... a tratar así mi acto de penitencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's pupils dilate as he watches your fingers tear his letter to shreds. When he opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse:{/n} "You are entitled to do this... to my act of penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las pupilas de Solomorne se ensanchan al ver cómo despedazas su carta. Con voz ronca, comenta:{/n} «Tiene derecho... a tratar así mi acto de penitencia».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙看着你将他的信撕成了碎片，他的瞳孔放大了。当他再次开口时，他的声音变得沙哑起来。{/n}“你有权……以这种方式处理我的忏悔。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's pupils dilate as he watches your fingers tear his letter to shreds. When he opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse:{/n} "You are entitled to do this... to my act of penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙看着你将他的信撕成了碎片，他的瞳孔放大了。当他再次开口时，他的声音变得沙哑起来。{/n}“你有权……以这种方式处理我的忏悔。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un gözleri, kâğıdı paramparça edişini izlerken fal taşı gibi açılıyor. Boğuk bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Suçlarıma karşılık bunu yapmaya hakkınız var."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's pupils dilate as he watches your fingers tear his letter to shreds. When he opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse:{/n} "You are entitled to do this... to my act of penance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un gözleri, mektubu paramparça edişini izlerken fal taşı gibi açılıyor. Boğuk bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Suçlarıma karşılık bunu yapmaya hakkınız var."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Pupillen weiten sich, als du seinen Brief zerreißt. Dann öffnet er seinen Mund und erklärt mit heiserer Stimme:{/n} "Ihr habt jedes Recht, das zu tun ... als Teil meiner Buße.
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's pupils dilate as he watches your fingers tear his letter to shreds. When he opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse:{/n} "You are entitled to do this... to my act of penance."
